00103         template<class T> void get(T &x)
00104         {
00105                 consumeType(x);
00106                 getWithoutType(x);
00107         }
00108 
00114         template<class T> void getForC(T &x)
00115         {
00116                 consumeType(x);
00117                 getWithoutTypeForC(x);
00118         }
00119 
00127         template<class T> void get(Integer &size, T *&x)
00128         {
00129                 T y;
00130                 
00131                 checkType(ArrayType, "(1D)");
00132                 size = get1DArrayHeader(y);
00133                 x = new T[size];
00134                 get1DArrayBody(y, x, size);
00135         }
00136 
00145         template<class T> void getForC(Integer &size, T *&x)
00146         {
00147                 T y;
00148                 
00149                 checkType(ArrayType, "(1D)");
00150                 size = get1DArrayHeader(y);
00151                 x = (T *)calloc(size, sizeof(T));
00152                 get1DArrayBodyForC(y, x, size);
00153         }
00154 
00163         template<class T> void get(Integer &xSize, Integer &ySize, T **&array)
00164         {
00165                 T y;
00166                 Integer dimensions ;
00167 
00168                 checkType(ArrayType, "(2D)");
00169                 consumeType(y, "array (2D)");
00170                 getWithoutType(dimensions);
00171                 
00172                 if (dimensions != 2)
00173                 {
00174                         std::string message("expecting 2 dimensional array, received ");
00175                         message += dimensions;
00176                         message += " dimensions";
00177 
00178                         throw new SBWTypeMismatchException(message);
00179                 }
00180 
00181                 getWithoutType(xSize);
00182                 getWithoutType(ySize);
00183 
00184                 array = new T *[xSize];
00185                 int xItem = 0 ;
00186 
00187                 while (xItem != xSize)
00188                 {
00189                         int yItem = 0 ;
00190 
00191                         array[xItem] = new T[ySize];
00192 
00193                         while (yItem != ySize)
00194                         {
00195                                 getWithoutType(y);
00196                                 array[xItem][yItem] = y ;
00197                                 yItem++ ;
00198                         }
00199                         xItem++ ;
00200                 }
00201         }
00202 
00208         template<class T> static void free2DArray(Integer xSize, T **a)
00209         {
00210                 while (xSize != 0)
00211                 {
00212                         xSize-- ;
00213                         delete[] a[xSize];
00214                 }
00215 
00216                 delete[] a ;
00217         }
00218 
00228         template<class T> void getForC(Integer &xSize, Integer &ySize, T **&array)
00229         {
00230                 T y;
00231                 Integer dimensions ;
00232 
00233                 checkType(ArrayType, "(2D)");
00234                 consumeType(y, "array (2D)");
00235                 getWithoutType(dimensions);
00236                 
00237                 if (dimensions != 2)
00238                 {
00239                         std::string message = "expecting 2 dimensional array, received ";
00240                         message += dimensions;
00241                         message += " dimensions";
00242 
00243                         throw new SBWTypeMismatchException(message);
00244                 }
00245 
00246                 getWithoutType(xSize);
00247                 getWithoutType(ySize);
00248 
00249                 array = (T **)calloc(xSize, sizeof(T *));
00250                 int xItem = 0 ;
00251 
00252                 while (xItem != xSize)
00253                 {
00254                         int yItem = 0 ;
00255 
00256                         array[xItem] = (T *)calloc(ySize, sizeof(T));
00257 
00258                         while (yItem != ySize)
00259                         {
00260                                 getWithoutTypeForC(y);
00261                                 array[xItem][yItem] = y ;
00262                                 yItem++ ;
00263                         }
00264                         xItem++ ;
00265                 }
00266         }

00279         {
00280                 checkType(getType(x), s);
00281         }

00347         void getWithoutTypeForC(sbwDataBlockReader *&x)
00348         {
00349                 getWithoutType(x);
00350                 x->AddReference(); // in C readers have to explictly freed
00351                                                    // add extra reference to ensure they aren't freed
00352                                                    // till then
00353         }
00354 
00360         template<class T> void getWithoutType(std::vector<T> &v)
00361         {
00362                 T x;
00363                 Integer size = get1DArrayHeader(x);
00364 
00365                 v.reserve(size);
00366                 v.resize(size);
00367                 get1DArrayBody(x, v.begin(), size);
00368         }
00369 
00375         template<class T> void getWithoutType(std::deque<T> &d)
00376         {
00377                 T x;
00378                 Integer size = get1DArrayHeader(x);
00379 
00380                 d.clear();
00381                 while (size != 0)
00382                 {
00383                         getWithoutType(x);
00384                         d.push_back(x);
00385                         size-- ;
00386                 }
00387         }
00388 
00394         template<class T> void getWithoutType(std::list<T> &l)
00395         {
00396                 T x;
00397                 Integer size = get1DArrayHeader(x);
00398 
00399                 l.clear();
00400                 while (size != 0)
00401                 {
00402                         getWithoutType(x);
00403                         l.push_back(x);
00404                         size-- ;
00405                 }
00406         }
00407 
00416         template<class T> Integer get1DArrayHeader(T &x)
00417         {
00418                 Integer dimensions ;
00419                 Integer size ;
00420 
00421                 consumeType(x);
00422                 getWithoutType(dimensions);
00423                 
00424                 if (dimensions != 1)
00425                         throw new SBWTypeMismatchException("expecting 1 dimensional array");
00426 
00427                 getWithoutType(size);
00428 
00429                 return size ;
00430         }
00431 
00438         template<class T, class I> void get1DArrayBody(T &x, I i, Integer size)
00439         {
00440                 int item = 0 ;
00441 
00442                 while (item != size)
00443                 {
00444                         getWithoutType(x);
00445                         *i = x ;
00446                         i++;
00447                         item++ ;
00448                 }
00449         }
00450 
00458         template<class T, class I> void get1DArrayBodyForC(T &x, I i, Integer size)
00459         {
00460                 int item = 0 ;
00461 
00462                 while (item != size)
00463                 {
00464                         getWithoutTypeForC(x);
00465                         *i = x ;
00466                         i++;
00467                         item++ ;
00468                 }
00469         }
